@NonNullApi

程序包 org.springframework.data.auditing.config

Types to abstract authentication concepts.

请参阅: 说明

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    AuditingConfiguration
    Configuration information for auditing.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    AnnotationAuditingConfiguration
    Default implementation for AuditingConfiguration.
    AuditingBeanDefinitionRegistrarSupport
    A ImportBeanDefinitionRegistrar that serves as a base class for store specific implementations for configuring audit support.
    AuditingHandlerBeanDefinitionParser
    BeanDefinitionParser that parses an AuditingHandler BeanDefinition
    IsNewAwareAuditingHandlerBeanDefinitionParser
    AuditingHandlerBeanDefinitionParser that will register am IsNewAwareAuditingHandler.
